name: a Place to Grow (Raddi)
description:
Plot

Amandra, a little Mandrake, has enough of the nutient arm forest ground and decides to search for a better Place to grow.

Controlls

Keyboard:

Walking [A] & [D]

Climbing & Camera [W] & [S]

Jump [Space]

Plant [E]

Controller:

Walking & Climbing (Left Stick)

Camera (Right Stick)

Jump (A)

Plant (X)

Credits

Audio: Epidemicsounds

Programming and Design: 

Me with the Help of my Friends and Teachers
